name: Peter Broeker
introduction: Peter Broeker (May 15 1926 in Germany - November 4 1980 in Ottawa, Ontario) was a driver representing Canada, even though he held dual citizenship with the United States. Broeker ran in one race, the 1963 United States Grand Prix, in a Canadian-built car, the Stebro. Using a production-based Ford L4, Broeker managed to finish seventh in a race of attrition, despite giving up 80hp to the rest of the field.
